dataList.name: Decamillennial Hearthflame
dataList.desc: Turn End: enemies with 3+ [Combustion] Count activates [Combustion] one more time (reduce [Combustion] Count by 1)

dataList.name: Purloined Flame
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply [Combustion] or 'Unique Burn'. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field)

On Hit with a Skill(including E.G.O Skills): if the target has 3+ [Combustion] Count, activate [Combustion] once on the target. (target loses 1 [Combustion] Count; activates once per Skill)

Turn End: targets with 3+ [Combustion] Count activates [Combustion] one more time (target loses 1 [Combustion] Count)

If a target with [Combustion] is defeated(for Abnormalities, when the Core is defeated), inflict its remaining [Combustion] Potency to one of the enemies with the least [Combustion] Potency at the next Turn Start.

Turn Start: for this turn, inflict 4 [AttackDown] to enemies with [Combustion]

If a target with [Combustion] is defeated, at the next Turn Start, (defeated enemy's [Combustion] Potency / 15) allies with Skills that inflict [Combustion] gain 2 [AttackDmgUp]. (once per turn)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Activate [Combustion] once
Activate [Combustion] 1 more time
Inflict ([Combustion] Potency on defeated enemy)/2 [Combustion] Potency
Inflict 4 [AttackDown]
Gain 2 [AttackDmgUp]

dataList.name: Ruptured Blood Sac
dataList.desc: On ally Clash Win: activate the enemy's [Laceration] once (3 times per turn)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Activate Bleed once

dataList.name: Hemorrhagic Shock
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply [Laceration] or 'Unique Bleed' effects. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field)

On ally Clash Win: activate the enemy's [Laceration] once. (once per turn for each ally)

Enemies become Staggerable by [Laceration] Damage; if an enemy gets Staggered due to [Laceration] damage mid-Clash, activate [Laceration] (# of remaining enemy Coins) times

If all enemies have [Laceration], they lose 2 Defense Levels. At Turn End, inflict (# of [Laceration] activations x 2) [DefenseDown] next turn (max 20)

When inflicting [Laceration] Potency or 'Unique Bleed' with Skill effects, inflict 3 [Laceration] Potency and +1 [Laceration] Count on the target

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: On Clash Win, activate Bleed on the target once
After Clashing, activate the enemy's [Laceration] (# of remaining Coins on self) times
Inflict (# of [Laceration] activations x 2) [DefenseDown] (max 20)
Inflict 3 Bleed Potency and +1 Bleed Count

dataList.name: Gemstone Oscillator
dataList.desc:
When winning a Clash with a Skill that consumed [Vibration] Count: if the target does not have [Vibration], inflict +2 [Vibration] Count

At 3+ Sloth Reson. including this Skill, inflict +3 [Vibration] Count instead

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When winning a Clash with a Skill that consumed [Vibration] Count, inflict +2 [Vibration] Count
When winning a Clash with a Skill that consumed [Vibration] Count and is a part of a 3+ Sloth Reson.: inflict +3 [Vibration] Count

dataList.name: Wobbling Keg
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: at 8+ [Vibration] Count, Clash Power +1

When defeating or Staggering an enemy with a Skill that consumes [Vibration] Count on self: gain +([Vibration] Count consumed / 4) [Vibration] Count (once per Skill)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: At 8+ Tremor Count, Clash Power +1
When winning a Clash with a Skill that consumes [Vibration] Count: gain [Vibration] Count

dataList.name: Epicenter
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply [Vibration] Potency or Count. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field)
(If an Identity only has Attack Skills that gain [Vibration] Count on self, this E.G.O Gift does not activate for them)

When winning a Clash with a Skill that consumed [Vibration] Count on self: if the target does not have [Vibration], inflict +3 [Vibration] Count

Turn Start: gain Clash Power +([Vibration] Count on self / 5) (max 3)

When using a Skill that consumes [Vibration] Count on self: if the target is defeated or Staggered, gain +([Vibration] Count consumed / 2) [Vibration] Count (once per Skill)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When winning a Clash with a Skill that consumed [Vibration] Count on self: if the target does not have [Vibration], inflict +3 [Vibration] Count
Turn Start: gain ([Vibration] Count on self / 5) Clash Power
When winning a Clash with a Skill that consumes [Vibration] Count: gain [Vibration] Count

dataList.name: Omnivibro-octovecti-bell
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply [Vibration] Potency, Count, or 'Unique Tremor'. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field)
(If an Identity only has Attack Skills that gain [Vibration] Count on self, this E.G.O Gift does not activate for them)

When winning a Clash with a Skill that inflicts [Vibration] Potency or Count, or consumes [Vibration] Count on self: inflict (# of remaining Coins) [Vibration] Potency against the target; if the target does not have [Vibration], inflict +3 [Vibration] Count

Turn Start: gain (1 + ([Vibration] Count on self / 5)) [ParryingResultUp]. (max 3)

When using a Skill that consumes [Vibration] Count on self: when defeating or Staggering a target, gain ([Vibration] Count consumed / 2) [Vibration] Count (once per Skill)

Skills that consume [Vibration] Count on self deal +([Vibration] consumed on self + [Vibration] Potency on the enemy + 5)% damage (except E.G.O Skills; max 50%)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: On Clash Win, inflict Tremor equal to the # of remaining Coins. If the target does not have [Vibration], inflict Tremor Count
Turm Start: gain Clash Power Up based on Tremor Count on self
When winning a Clash with a Skill that consumes [Vibration] Count: gain [Vibration] Count
Skills that consume [Tremor] Count deal more damage

dataList.name: Shard of Apocalypse
dataList.desc: If the target has less than 15 [Burst] Potency, inflict 1 additional Potency when inflicting [Burst] Potency

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict 1 additional [Burst] Potency

dataList.name: Eerie Effigy
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply [Burst] Potency or Count. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field)
[Burst] effects deal +100% damage against enemy Shields
If the target has less than 15 [Burst] Potency, inflict 2 more Potency when inflicting [Burst] Potency

If [Burst] cannot be applied due to Skill effects, gain Coin Power +1 instead

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Rupture effects deal +100% damage against Shields
Inflict 2 additional [Burst] Potency
If [Burst] cannot be applied due to Skill effects, gain Coin Power +1 instead

dataList.name: Ruin
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply [Burst] Potency or Count. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field)

[Burst] effects deal +150% damage against enemy Shield

Turn Start: enemies or Parts with [Burst] lose (3 + ([Burst] Potency / 2)) Offense Level and Defense Level. (max 6)

When inflicting [Burst] Potency with Skill effects, inflict 2 [Burst] Potency and +1 [Burst] Count against the target. If the target has less than 15 [Burst] Potency, inflict 2 additional [Burst] Potency.

Coin Power +1 for Plus Coin Skills that inflict [Burst] Potency, Count, or 'Unique Rupture'
Base Power +(4 / # of Coins) (min. 1; rounded down) for Minus Coin Skills that inflict [Burst] Potency, Count, or 'Unique Rupture'

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: [Burst] effects deal +150% damage against Shields
Enemies with [Burst] lose Offense and Defense Levels
When inflicting [Burst] Potency with Skill effects, Inflict 2 [Burst] Potency and +1 [Burst] Count on target
Gain Coin Power

dataList.name: Cantabile
dataList.desc: When using base Attack Skills, if the target has 5+ [Sinking] Potency, heal ([Sinking] Potency on the target / 10) SP on self (max 3)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Heal SP based on Sinking on the target

dataList.name: Faded Overcoat
dataList.desc: Turn End: if there are 3+ enemies with -45 SP, all allies gain 2 [AttackUp] next turn

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain 2 [AttackUp]

dataList.name: Surging Globe
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply [Sinking] Potency, Count, or 'Unique Sinking'. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field)

When using a base Attack Skill, if the enemy has 5+ [Sinking] Potency, heal ([Sinking] Potency on the target / 10) SP on self (max 5)

Turn End: next turn, all allies gain [AttackUp] equal to the number of enemies with -45 SP (max 3)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Heal SP based on Sinking on the target
All allies gain [AttackUp] equal to the number of enemies with -45 SP (max 3)

dataList.name: Impending Wave
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply [Sinking] Potency, Count, or 'Unique Sinking'. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field)

Turn Start: inflict 1 [WaveSinking] against a random enemy

When an enemy with [WaveSinking] is killed, at the next Turn Start, transfer the [WaveSinking] Stack from the said enemy to an enemy with the highest, but not maxed, [WaveSinking] Stack

When hitting and dealing HP damage to an enemy with a Skill that inflicts [Sinking] Potency, Count, or 'Unique Sinking', inflict 4 [Sinking] Potency and +3 [Sinking] Count at Turn End (once per turn for each enemy)
Combat Start: when activating Gloom or Lust A-Reson., inflict 3 [Sinking] and +3 [Sinking] on all enemies (for Abnormalities, a random Part)

After using a base Attack Skill, if the target has 10+ [Sinking] Potency, heal ([Sinking] Potency on the target / 10) SP on self (max 5) and inflict the same amount as [DefenseDown] against the target (max 5; once per turn for each enemy)

Turn End: all allies gain [AttackUp] equal to the number of enemies with -45 SP or without SP next turn (max 6)

Coin Power +1 for Plus Coin Skills that inflict [Sinking] Potency, Count, or 'Unique Sinking'
Base Power +(4 / # of Coins) (min. 1; rounded down) for Minus Coin Skills that inflict [Sinking] Potency, Count, or 'Unique Sinking'

When activating the [Sinking] effect(including 'Unique Sinking') on the target with an On Hit effect from a Base Attack Skill that inflicts or gains [Sinking] Potency, [Sinking] Count, or 'Unique Sinking', heal 5 SP at Turn End (2 times per turn per Identity)
If the unit was at 45 SP at Turn Start, the effect changes to the following: when hitting and activating the [Sinking] effect(including 'Unique Sinking') on the target with a base Attack Skill, inflict +3 [Sinking] Count against the targeted enemy (2 times per turn per Identity)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict Sinking
Inflict Defense Level Down
Apply Offense Level Up
Heal SP
Inflict Sinking
Gain Coin Power
Gain Base Power
Inflict Reflux
Inflict Reflux

dataList.name: Angel's Cut
dataList.desc: Turn End: when an ally has more than 20 Poise Potency, the said unit consumes 1 Poise Potency to gain +1 Poise Count

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Consume 1 Poise Potency to gain 1 Poise Count

dataList.name: Cask Spirits
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply or gain [Breath] Potency or Count. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field)

Turn End: If an ally has more than 20 [Breath] Potency on self, the ally consumes 1 [Breath] Potency to gain 1 [Breath] Count

Turn End: 1 ally with the highest [Breath] Potency and 1 ally with the highest [Breath] Count gain 2 [Agility] and 1 [AttackUp] next turn (can activate on the same Identity)

When gaining [Breath] Potency from Skill effects, gain additional 2 [Breath] Potency and +2 [Breath] Count. If the sum of [Breath] Potency and Count on self is less than 20, gain 3 [Breath] Potency and +3 [Breath] Count instead.

Combat End: at more than 40 [Breath] Potency, consume 15 [Breath] Potency to [Discard] 1 Skill of the lowest rank in all of that unit's Skill Slots (once per turn for each character)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain Poise Count
Apply 2 Haste and 1 Offense Level Up
When gaining [Breath] Potency with Skill effects, gain additional Potency and Count
Discard a Skill of the lowest rank in this unit's Skill Slot

dataList.name: Miniature Telepole
dataList.desc: After Attack with a Skill Attack that consumed 7+ [Charge] Count on self: if the target is defeated, gain ([Charge] Count consumed by the Skill / 4) [Charge] Count

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain [Charge] Count based on [Charge] Count consumed

dataList.name: Insulator
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that gain [Charge] Count or 'Unique Charge'. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field)

After Attack With a Skill Attack that consumes [Charge] Count on self: if the target is defeated, gain ([Charge] Count consumed by the Skill / 3) [Charge] Count

Turn Start: at less than 3 [Charge] Count, gain +3 [Charge] Count
Turn Start: at 3+ [Charge] Count, gain 1 [AttackDmgUp]

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain [Charge] Count based on [Charge] Count consumed
Gain 1 [AttackDmgUp] or [Charge] Count based on [Charge] Count

dataList.name: T-5 Perpetual Motion Machine
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that gain [Charge] Count or 'Unique Charge'. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field)

Turn Start: at less than 3 [Charge] Count, gain +5 [Charge] Count.
Turn Start: at 5+ [Charge] Count, gain +2 min/max Speed, 1 [Enhancement], and 2 [AttackDmgUp].

All allies on the field gain [ShareCharge] at Turn Start.

After Attack with a Skill 3 that consumes or gains [Charge] Count on self: if the target is defeated, or if the ally who used the Skill is at 3+ [Charge], they add 1 Skill 3 to the list of Skills for the next upcoming turn. (once per turn for each ally)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 1 [AttackDmgUp] or [Charge] Count based on [Charge] Count
Gain [Charge] Count based on [Charge] Count consumed. Next turn, gain [PlusCoinValueUp]
After Attack with a Skill 3 that consumed [Charge] Count, add 1 Skill 3 to the Skill list
